name: Rovastar & Unchained - Orb Of Voodoo
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=2.000000
fDecay=0.900000
fVideoEchoZoom=0.999510
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.500000
nVideoEchoOrientation=1
nWaveMode=2
bAdditiveWaves=1
bWaveDots=0
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=0
bDarkenCenter=0
bMotionVectorsOn=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
nMotionVectorsX=12
nMotionVectorsY=9
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=2.781664
fWaveScale=0.620217
fWaveSmoothing=0.360000
fWaveParam=0.000000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000000
fWarpScale=1.000000
fZoomExponent=7.523901
fShader=0.000000
zoom=1.009898
rot=0.000000
cx=0.470000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000000
dy=0.000000
warp=1.000000
sx=0.990099
sy=0.990099
wave_r=0.500000
wave_g=0.500000
wave_b=0.500000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.450000
ob_size=0.010000
ob_r=0.000000
ob_g=0.000000
ob_b=0.000000
ob_a=0.000000
ib_size=0.010000
ib_r=0.250000
ib_g=0.250000
ib_b=0.250000
ib_a=0.000000
per_frame_1=warp=0;
per_frame_2=state=if(above(bass_att,1.3),2+bass,if(above(treb_att,1.3),2,1));
per_frame_3=wave_b=if(above(state,2.7),.2+.2*sin(time),if(equal(state,3),.9+.1*sin(time),.6+.08*sin(time)));
per_frame_4=wave_g=if(above(state,2.9),0,if(equal(state,3),0,.29));
per_frame_5=wave_r=if(above(state,3),.75+.1*sin(time*.55),0);
per_frame_6=zoom=if(above(bass_att+treb,2),1+cos(state*1.3)/10,1-sin(state*1.5)/10);
per_frame_7=q1=state;
per_frame_8=wave_mystery=time/3+bass/10;
per_pixel_1=myval=  q1+sin(time/3)/10;
per_pixel_2=zoom=2+if(above(myval,3),sin(pow(-rad,5))/10,sin(-rad));
per_pixel_3=rot = if(above(myval,3),sin(rad)/20,cos((x))/10);
per_pixel_4=sx = 1-sin(x)/15;
